LEFT OUTER JOIN VESSEL_FEATURES VF ON AC.VESSEL_FK = VF.VESSEL_FK AND VF.START_DATE <= &startDate AND COALESCE(VF.END_DATE, to_date('01-01-2100','DD-MM-YYYY')) > &startDate
LEFT OUTER JOIN VESSEL_FEATURES VF ON AC.VESSEL_FK = VF.VESSEL_FK AND VF.START_DATE <= &startDate AND NVL(VF.END_DATE, to_date('01-01-2100','DD-MM-YYYY')) > &startDate
LEFT OUTER JOIN &adagioSchema.VESSEL_FEATURES VF ON AC.VESSEL_FK = VF.VESSEL_FK AND VF.START_DATE_TIME <= &startDate AND NVL(VF.END_DATE_TIME, to_date('01-01-2100','DD-MM-YYYY')) > &startDate
